title: Looking for duo queue partner to grind to gold 5.
body:
Hi I am Surgical on Oce, looking for a friendly duo queue partner that can grind to gold, i am soon to be b3 by today and potentially s5 by weekend.

Requirements:

Friendly & Able to play minimum 3-5 matches per day
B3+ (Not looking for anyone lower that B3)
Willing to grind daily to G5 until Nov 11


If you fulfill these requirements or know someone who would be willing to, let me know or add me ingame on "Surgical".

 I am proficient at following champs:

Elise (Jungle)
Renekton (Top)
Thresh (Support)
Janna (Support)
Blitzcrank (Support)

I am verging on being proficient consistently on:

Leona (Support)
Morgana (Support)
Heimerdinger (Support)
Katarina (Mid)
Kayle (Support/Mid/Top)
Shyvanna (Jungle)
Warwick (Jungle)

replies.body: HEY dude i am in silver 4, send me a request but just hope your not in low bronze like 3,4,5.

Awsome i have been looking for a partner as well, 

im in b3 (was in b1 and was in silver 5 promo's) and i have been going back and forth in wins and loses, I'm more than happy to grind to g5 with you if you want to join up 

Add me: The Gingninj69

i can play adc, mid and top

adc champs- Lucian, Ashe, Kindred and jinx
Mid champs- Katarina, Ekko, Yasuo and Zed
Top champs- Renekton, Garen, Gnar and Darius

Heya Guy,

I'm on the look out for a duo partner too. Names Zarkin and I'm S5 currently, would love to grind to G5 with you! Given that you can handle defeats well and move on to the next game.

Add me: Zarkin

Cheers
